short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically claims Twitch channel watch rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever been in a different tab or been away while leaving a stream on, and came back to the stream realizing you could've claimed your watch reward a long time ago? This extension allows you to sit back and focus your attention on other things while it claims your points automatically for you, instead of needing to periodically checking on the chat to claim your rewards.
